org.apache.dubbo.remoting

Interface Client

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Channel, Endpoint, IdleSensible, Resetable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExchangeClient
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractClient, ClientDelegate, GrizzlyClient, HeaderExchangeClient, MinaClient, NettyClient, NettyClient

    public interface Client
extends Endpoint, Channel, Resetable, IdleSensible
    Remoting Client. (API/SPI, Prototype, ThreadSafe)

    Client/Server

    See Also:
